chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
v: Vector.t nat n
u: Vector.t nat n

Goal:
vec_zero = vec_plus u v -> u = vec_zero /\ v = vec_zero

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, pos (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, pos n -> pos (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Module Vector := Struct Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, t A n -> t A (S n) Definition t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Type), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t. Definition t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Prop), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (n : nat
vec_zero = vec_set_pos (fun _ : pos n => 0) : vec nat n
vec_plus = fun v w : vec nat n => vec_set_pos (fun p : pos n => vec_pos v p + vec_pos w p) : vec nat n -> vec nat n -> vec nat n
vec_zero_plus : forall v : vec nat n, vec_plus vec_zero v = v
vec_plus_assoc : forall u v w : vec nat n, vec_plus u (vec_plus v w) = vec_plus (vec_plus u v) w
vec_zero_spec : forall p : pos n, vec_pos vec_zero p = 0
vec_plus_comm : forall v w : vec nat n, vec_plus v w = vec_plus w v
Init.Nat.pred = fun n : nat => match n with | 0 => n | S u => u end : nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.pred _%nat_scope
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v0 : vec ?A n0) (w : vec ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v0 w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v0 p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type]
andb_prop : forall a b : bool, (a && b)%bool = true -> a = true /\ b = true
andb_true_intro : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 = true /\ b2 = true -> (b1 && b2)%bool = true
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v0 : vec ?A n0) (p1 p2 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v0) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v0 p2) where ?A : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorEq.cast : vec ?A ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> vec ?A n0 where ?A : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?m : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_splitat : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m) (vw : vec ?A (?n + ?m)), VectorDef.splitat ?n vw = (v0, w) -> vw = VectorDef.append v0 w where ?A : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.fold_left_right_assoc_eq : (forall (a : ?A) (b c : ?B), ?f (?f a b) c = ?f (?f a c) b) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v0 : vec ?B n0) (a : ?A), VectorDef.fold_left ?f a v0 = VectorDef.fold_right (fun (x : ?B) (y : ?A) => ?f y x) v0 a where ?A : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?f : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- ?A -> ?B -> ?A]
vec_cons_inv : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (x y : X) (v w : vec X n), x ## v = y ## w -> x = y /\ v = w
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v0 : vec ?A (S ?n), v0 = VectorDef.hd v0 ## VectorDef.tl v0 where ?A : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.uncons_cons : forall (a : ?A) (v0 : vec ?A ?n), VectorDef.uncons (a ## v0) = (a, v0) where ?A : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.splitat_append : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m), VectorDef.splitat ?n (VectorDef.append v0 w) = (v0, w) where ?A : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.take_O : forall (le : 0 <= ?n) (v0 : vec ?A ?n), VectorDef.take 0 le v0 = vec_nil where ?A : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_comm_cons : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m) (a : ?A), a ## VectorDef.append v0 w = VectorDef.append (a ## v0) w where ?A : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- nat]
pair_equal_spec : forall (A B : Type) (a1 a2 : A) (b1 b2 : B), (a1, b1) = (a2, b2) < -> a1 = a2 /\ b1 = b2
VectorDef.fold_left2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C -> ?A) -> ?A -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 -> ?A where ?A : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.fold_right2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C -> ?C) -> ?C -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> ?C where ?A : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type]
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 where ?A : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type]
vec_map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 where ?A : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat u : vec nat n v : vec nat n |- Type]

```coq
intros eq_vec.
assert (forall p : pos n, vec_pos u p = 0 /\ vec_pos v p = 0).
{
  intro p.
  assert (vec_pos vec_zero p = 0) by apply vec_zero_spec.
  rewrite eq_vec in H.
  assert (vec_plus u v = vec_plus v u) by apply vec_plus_comm.
  rewrite H0 in H.
  assert (vec_plus u v = vec_set_pos (fun p : pos n => vec_pos u p + vec_pos v p)).
  {
    unfold vec_plus.
    reflexivity.
  }
  rewrite H1 in H.
  assert (vec_set_pos (fun p : pos n => vec_pos u p + vec_pos v p) p = 0).
  {
    rewrite H2.
    reflexivity.
  }
  assert (vec_pos u p + vec_pos v p = 0).
  {
    apply VectorSpec.nth_map2 with (f := fun x y => x + y) (n0 := n) (v0 := u) (w := v).
    auto.
  }
  omega.
}
split.
{
  apply VectorEq.cast with (m := n).
  apply vec_eq_ext.
  intros p.
  apply H.
  auto.
}
{
  apply VectorEq.cast with (m := n).
  apply vec_eq_ext.
  intros p.
  apply H.
  auto.
}
Qed.
